Text:
nice share sir
any chance in small size (272p) ?
Sorry, no. Was extremely tricky to encode, done and get deleted.

Hello Twentyforty.

I realise that requests are on hold. However, I was wondering whether you might be prepared to do 'Green Lantern - First Flight' for me.

There are some high quality rips available but i cannot afford the file size.

Please know that whether it is uploaded tomorrow or in a months time, it does not matter. I would just like to add this to my collection. 

Many thanks.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1384590/
@Killjoy88: OK, sometime next week or week after I guess. Remind me by the end of next week, please.
@Killjoy88: I forgot to ask: 480p 500MB or 720p 700MB. It could be 352p or 272p but it's heresy to rip BluRay in extra small format ( and gains in size are to small - maybe 150MB). So,choose.
